availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Hobson (Trigg/ Caldwell County, Farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Lydia Hobson. Father of Mary J. Hobson, Benjamin A. Hobson, Susan A. Hobson, John W. Hobson, Matthew W. Hobson, Sarah Hobson, and Jesse Hobson. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 306A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 36.
